channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: HeroCraft PC Complete Collection
item.content:encoded:
Delve into the adventurous, strategic, humorous games of indie publisher HeroCraft PC with this massive new bundle! Rebuild humanity on an ever-changing Earth in the post-apocalyptic 4X strategy game Revival: Recolonization. Take control of a grim recycling facility in the darkly satirical sim Organs Please. Take command of a Space Wolves squad on the turn-based, card-based battlefields of Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf*. Get Anvil Saga, Tempest, and more, and support International Medical Corps with your purchase.

Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf and associated DLC will no longer be available for purchase after October 12, 2023. Get it while you can!

item.title: Get Your Head in the Game VR
item.description: Get in the middle of the action
item.content:encoded: Stay focused and face your foes head-on in this intense new collection of virtual reality games! Annihilate anyone who dares to stand between you and your destiny in the dark fantasy RPG Grimlord. Search for your lost sister in the sinister survival-horror halls of Propagation: Paradise Hotel. Escape the super-spy situations of I Expect You to Die 2, crawl the dungeons of Demeo, and more—and help support Direct Relief and International Medical Corps with your purchase.

item.title: Untold Tales of Adventure
item.description: Wondrous, quirky fun from Untold Tales
item.content:encoded:
Explore the unique, story-rich worlds of indie publisher Untold Tales! Bounce around history on a chaotic quest of open-world exploration and destruction in Bang-On Balls: Chronicles. Play one last game among the ruins of Earth—now a golf course for the ultra-rich—in the dystopian sports puzzler Golf Club Nostalgia. Manipulate time and reshape your surroundings in the emotional, bittersweet Arise: A Simple Story, and much more, and help support One Tree Planted and the charity of your choice!

Bonus! Save 25% on Untold Tales’ brand-new release BOTI: Byteland Overclocked when you pay $10 (USD) or more. Coupon expires October 18.

item.title: Cities Skylines: Build Today, Plan for Tomorrow!
item.content:encoded: Looking forward to making the metropolis of your dreams in the upcoming Cities: Skylines II? Let your civic imagination run wild today in this sprawling bundle featuring the original Cities: Skylines, plus major expansions like Airports and Plazas & Promenades, and more add-ons from across the game’s history. Experience the challenges, crises, and triumphs of municipal planning today; get hyped for the sequel coming October 24; and help support Coral Guardian & Oceana with your purchase!

item.title: Strike from the Shadows: Top-Down Stealth
item.description: Get the drop on your foes
item.content:encoded: Execute espionage, sabotage, and subterfuge from above in this collection of stealth games played from a hawk’s eye perspective! Mop up murder scenes for the mob in the homage to 90s crime movies Serial Cleaners. Plan your tactics on the eastern front of WW2 in War Mongrels. Stalk your foes in Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun and its acclaimed standalone expansion Aiko's Choice, and more—and help support Active Minds and the charity of your choice with your purchase.

item.title: PC Building Simulator Rebooted
item.content:encoded: Build, boot up, and benchmark the high-end machines of your dreams in PC Building Simulator, the acclaimed sim that draws on real-world components and part makers. Pick up the core game and a virtual warehouse of extra content, including the Esports Expansion that puts a new spin on career mode, plus a collection of Workshop add-ons that give you tons more options to choose from for your rig. Whether you’re a novice hobbyist looking to learn or a PC Building Simulator pro rounding out your collection, this bundle has something for you. Plus, your purchase helps support the charity of your choice!

item.title: Tales from Wales Interactive
item.content:encoded: Guide the action, steer the conversation, and be the arbiter of characters’ fates in this collection of interactive live-action movies and games from Wales Interactive! Uncover the perilous scientific secrets waiting in the locked-down laboratories of The Complex. Try to prove your innocence in the high-stakes crime thriller Late Shift. Navigate the landscape of modern love in the romantic comedy Five Dates, and more, and help support Alzheimer’s Research UK with your purchase!
